e="preserve">Bruce Arthur Johnston (born Benjamin Baldwin; June 27, 1942) is an American singer-songwriter, musician, and record producer. He is best known as a member of the Beach Boys. He was born in Peoria, Illinois.
His songs for the Beach Boys include "Tears in the Morning" (1970), "Deirdre" (1970), and "Disney Girls (1957)" (1971). He continues to tour as a member of the Beach Boys alongside band co-founder Mike Love.
